text: Abaho watumigwa na wavele na wanhu wose wamtogole Yesu ako Yelusalemu, waitogolela kusagula wanhu kulawa mdibumbila na kuwagala Antiokia hamoja na Balinaba na Paulo. Wawasagula wanhu wabili wakalile wotegelezigwa ng'hani na wanhu wamtogole Yesu, wanhu wao wakala Yuda yakemigwe Balisaba na Sila.
